content.txt1: Iri basa rinogona kuita mabasa akafanana kune chaiyo-munhu mashandiro kusanganisira, asi kwete mashoma ekudzvanya, kuvhura mapurogiramu, etc. pafoni yako, uye inogona zvakare kuvhura zvimwe zvekubhadhara kubhadhara. Nekuti kune njodzi dzekushanda kurekodwa, uchibhadhara, nezvimwe, isu tinokurudzira kuti unongozvibata chete kana uchinyatsonzwisisa zviri mukati megwaro.
content.txt2: Maitiro Ekuvhara Iri Basa: Vhura peji rekushandisa iyi, unogona kumira uchishandisa basa reAuxiliary mune peji reMusha Peji, kana iwe unogona kudzvanya Tese mabasa uye kubuda "bhatani riri papeji peji. Iri bhatani rinosimbisa kuvharwa kwemabasa ese ari kuurayiwa uye kusimbisa kuvhara iyi app.
content.txt3: Chikonzero chatinoshandisa basa iri ndechekuti chishandiso chedu chinoda kuve nekukasira kuvhura zvimwe zvekushandisa mushure mekutengeswa, uye tumira mameseji kune online shamwari, etc., izvo zvinonakidza kana vashandi vekuchengetedza vashandi.
content.title: Mashandiro ane njodzi
